dcterms:creator: Xin Li
Dan Roth
dcterms:description: A Text Classification (TC) dataset containing more than 6,000 questions and 50 different class labels that specify the type of questions.
dcterms:title: TREC

dcterms:creator: Richard Socher
Alex Perelygin
Jean Wu
Jason Chuang
Christopher D Manning
Andrew Y Ng
Christopher Potts
dcterms:description: A Sentiment Analysis (SA) dataset containing more than 11,000 movie reviews from ‘Rotten Tomatoes’. Every review is classified into one of the five classes: very positive, positive, neutral, negative, and very negative.
dcterms:title: Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST)

dcterms:description: A Named Entity Recognition (NER) dataset containing news stories from the Reuters corpus with more than 200K tokens annotated as Person, Organization, Location, Miscellaneous, or Other.
dcterms:title: CoNLL-2003

dcterms:creator: Daniel Cer
Mona Diab
Eneko Agirre
Iñigo Lopez-Gazpio
Lucia Specia
dcterms:description: A Semantic Similarity (SS) dataset comprising of more than 8K text pairs extracted from image captions, news headlines, and user forums. Each pair of sentences is assigned a similarity score between 0 and 5.
dcterms:title: STS benchmark

dcterms:creator: Yi Yang
Wen-tau Yih
Christopher Meek
dcterms:description: A Question Answering (QA) dataset composed of more than 3,000 questions and 29,000 sentences as answers extracted from Wikipedia.
dcterms:title: WikiQA (WQA)
